zh: 汤姆肯定会很喜欢那场音乐会的。

en: The parking lot was almost empty.
zh: 停车场里几乎没什么车。

en: I'm going to take a quick shower.
I wouldn't do it even if I could.
zh: 就算我能做，我也不会做的。

en: You've got no right to say that.
Whatever you do, don't tell Tom.
zh: 不管怎样，千万别告诉汤姆。

en: Tom, you're wanted on the phone.
Tom is doing a crossword puzzle.
I was born and raised in Boston.
You worked for Tom, didn't you?
zh: 你以前给汤姆打过工，对吧？

en: Tom was hiding under the table.
It's good to be back in Boston.
zh: 回到波士顿的感觉真好。

en: I'm glad I could be of service.
We don't have a swimming pool.
Tom stopped what he was doing.
I'm sure they're on their way.
zh: 我敢肯定他们在路上了。

en: I'm sorry, I meant no offence.
I'll be home as soon as I can.
I was thinking the same thing.
Do you know where my keys are?
zh: 你知道我的钥匙在哪儿吗？

en: Would you stop staring at me?
zh: 你能不能别盯着我看了？

en: Tom was sitting on the floor.

zh: 汤姆回答了玛丽的问题。

en: I'm not going to fool myself.
I wish I could've seen Tom.
zh: 我要是当时能见到汤姆就好了。

en: I'm really glad I came here.
zh: 我真庆幸自己来了这儿。

en: I'm glad I was able to help.
I'll be here if you need me.
zh: 如果你需要我，我就在这。

en: I wonder why they chose Tom.
zh: 我纳闷他们为什么选了汤姆。

en: Do you know what this means?
zh: 你知道这意味着什么吗？

en: I wonder what Tom will say.
I'm glad I could help out.
I want to see how it ends.
Are you going to tell Tom?

zh: 汤姆几乎一句话也没说。

en: I'm sorry I let you down.
I'm going to pick Tom up.
I'll go and look for Tom.
I'd just like to go home.
I want to come back here.
I took care of it myself.
I'm sorry if I hurt you.
zh: 对不起，如果我伤到了你。

en: I'll get a hold of you.

zh: 汤姆有一双蓝色的大眼睛。
我确定汤姆已经告诉你了。

en: Tom is in a bad mood.
I was out for a walk.

zh: 我已经做好了死的准备。
要是我们有时间就好了。

en: Tom is a distant relative of mine.
zh: 汤姆是我的一个远房亲戚。

en: How many innocent civilians were killed in Hiroshima and Nagasaki?
zh: 广岛和长崎有多少无辜平民丧生？

en: He didn't want to talk about it anymore.
My involvement with her left me a physical and mental wreck.
zh: 和她在一起搞得我身心俱疲。

en: Every type of socialization requires a lie.
zh: 任何形式的社交都离不开谎言。

en: Tom mastered French studying by himself.
zh: 汤姆通过自学精通了法语。

en: Tom learned French perfectly studying by himself.
zh: 汤姆自学了一口流利的法语。

en: Tom lives alone with his parents.
zh: 汤姆只和父母住在一起。

en: Tom is only a little older than Mary.
zh: 汤姆只比玛丽大一点儿。

en: It has been almost 4 years since Tom passed away in a car accident.
zh: 汤姆出车祸去世已经快四年了。

en: It's been almost four years since Tom died in a traffic accident.
zh: 汤姆死于交通事故已经快四年了。

en: Tom missed the last train and spent the night at an Internet cafe.
zh: 汤姆没赶上末班车，在网吧过了一夜。

en: Tom and Mary have a long distance relationship.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽在谈异地恋。

en: What languages do you speak, Tom?
When his wife died he was full of heartrending grief.
zh: 妻子去世时，他悲痛欲绝。

en: There was a handwritten note on the door.
zh: 门上贴着一张手写的便条。

en: It's embarrassing, but I've never read Tolstoy.
zh: 说来惭愧，我从来没读过托尔斯泰。

en: I, too, wanted to ask that the whole time.

zh: 汤姆从背后抱住了玛丽。

en: "I love being told I'm cute", said Tom, a little embarrassed.
zh: “我挺喜欢别人夸我可爱的，”汤姆有点不好意思地说道。

en: If you're not motivated, go back home. You'll just be a hindrance.
zh: 你要是没干劲就回家吧，在这儿只会碍事。
他又年轻又帅，还很有钱。

en: It's one of the largest cities in the world.
zh: 它是世界上最大的城市之一。

en: When I grow up, I want to be a firefighter.
zh: 我长大以后想当消防员。

en: What do you know about Israel?
Tom left the umbrella on the bus.
zh: 汤姆把伞忘在公交车上了。

en: Things didn't work out between Tom and Mary.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽最后没能在一起。

en: You carry too much stuff in your purse.
zh: 你包里装的东西太多了。

en: Tom's clothes are out of fashion.
We've got to find him before he does something stupid.
zh: 我们得在他做傻事之前找到他。

en: When I grow up, I want to be a fireman.
zh: 我长大以后想当消防员。

en: Fibre-optic cables can carry huge amounts of information.
zh: 光缆可以传输海量的信息。
我真的很喜欢法国的东西。

en: His great performance drew thundering applause from the audience.
zh: 他精彩的演出赢得了观众雷鸣般的掌声。

en: Recently I've been feeling a bit down.
Is it OK if we begin?
Tom fell and hit his elbow.
zh: 汤姆摔了一跤，撞到了胳膊肘。

en: There's one thing I don't understand.
Oh, Mary! Tom was just looking for you.
zh: 噢，玛丽！汤姆刚才正找你呢。

en: Tom can say "I can only speak French" in thirty languages.
zh: 汤姆可以用三十种语言说“我只会说法语”。

en: Tom is able to say "I can only speak French" in thirty languages.
zh: 汤姆能用三十种语言说“我只会说法语”。

en: Only looks and money count in this world.
Do you really care why I quit smoking?
zh: 你真的在乎我为什么要戒烟吗？

en: Do you really care when I get this done as long as I get it done?
zh: 只要我能做完，你真的在乎我什么时候搞定吗？

en: Do you really care what I think?
zh: 你真的在乎我怎么想吗？

en: Do you care who helps us?
Do you care where we go?
Do you care when we leave?
zh: 你在乎我们什么时候走吗？

en: Do you care what other people think?
Do you care what other people think about you?
zh: 你在乎别人怎么看你吗？

en: Do you care what kind of music we listen to?
zh: 你在乎我们听什么音乐吗？

en: Do you care how much it costs?
zh: 你在乎这东西要多少钱吗？

en: Do not delete this example sentence.
Is it really important to you why I quit smoking?
zh: 我为什么要戒烟，对你来说真的重要吗？

en: Where there's good, there's also bad.
Can you give motivation to people using the carrot and the stick?
zh: 你能用“胡萝卜加大棒”的方法来激励人吗？

en: Can you motivate people with "candies and the whip"?
zh: 你能用“糖果加鞭子”来激励人吗？

en: They picked out the best two works.
zh: 他们选出了最好的两件作品。

en: My Latin teacher used to look down sternly on me over the rim of her glasses, but now I know it only had to do with the fact that she was wearing reading glasses and that she will have found it a nuisance taking them off all the time, so what looked like contempt towards us students might well and truly have been kindness.
zh: 我的拉丁语老师以前常透过眼镜上沿严厉地盯着我，但现在我知道那只是因为她戴的是老花镜，而且觉得老是摘下来很麻烦，所以那些看起来像是在蔑视学生的眼神，其实很有可能是种善意。

en: Don't you want to know why I didn't do that?
zh: 你不想知道我为什么没那么做吗？

en: I don't think I could spend six hours alone with you.
zh: 我觉得我没法单独跟你待六个小时。

en: I want to show you something in my office.
zh: 我想给你看点我办公室里的东西。

en: I'm tired and I want to go home.
Aren't you able to speak French?
It's about my brother. Lately, he's been hanging out with the wrong sort of people. Don't you know anything about it?
zh: 是关于我哥的事。他最近总跟些不三不四的人混在一起。你一点儿都不知道吗？
这本词典几乎没什么用。

en: Tom seemed like he was about to burst into tears any minute.
zh: 汤姆看起来随时都会哭出来。

en: That attitude of his is quite disgusting.
zh: 他那个态度挺让人恶心的。

en: I don't want to go to the pool.
Your login attempt was not successful. Please try again.
Your attempt to retrieve your password was not successful. Please try again.
zh: 找回密码失败，请再试一次。

en: Answer the following question to receive your password.
zh: 回答以下问题以找回密码。

en: The email address you entered is already in use.
zh: 你输入的邮箱地址已经被占用了。

en: Please enter a valid email address.
zh: 请输入有效的电子邮箱地址。

en: I want to become a musician.
You should rest a little bit longer.
zh: 你应该再多休息一会儿。

en: I want to clarify in further research to what extent the conclusions of this paper can be generalized.
zh: 我想在进一步的研究中明确这篇论文的结论在多大程度上具有普适性。

en: What if Tom hadn't heard my voice at that time? What in the world would have happened? Just thinking about it gives me the chills.
zh: 如果当时汤姆没听到我的声音，到底会发生什么？光是想想我就起鸡皮疙瘩。

en: Tom and Mary are often together.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽经常在一起。

en: Tom normally doesn't show his feelings very much.
zh: 汤姆平时不太流露自己的感情。

en: Tom didn't want to be seen with Mary.
zh: 汤姆不想被人看到他跟玛丽在一起。

en: I don't want to talk to anybody today.
zh: 我今天不想跟任何人说话。

en: Tom stayed single his whole life.
Tom was a bachelor all his life.
zh: 汤姆一辈子都是单身汉。

en: If you were to start your life over again, to what time in your life would you like to go back?
zh: 如果人生可以重来，你想回到什么时候？

en: If you were to remake your life , to what age would you like to go back?
zh: 如果让你重活一次，你想回到几岁？

en: The fruiting season for the cherry trees is from June to July.
zh: 樱桃的产季是六月到七月。

en: Why do you love an idiot like me?
zh: 你为什么会喜欢我这种傻瓜？

en: There was once a time when men were forced to act manly and women forced to act in a feminine manner.
zh: 曾经有一段时期，男人被迫要像个男人，女人被迫要像个女人。

en: My father painted the wall white.
The teacher and the students are at the art museum.
zh: 老师和学生们都在美术馆。

en: Flawless precision is required in the measurements.
zh: 测量要求必须分毫不差。

en: Is that what Tom would want?
What I'm going to do is study French.
The thing I'm planning to do is study French.
zh: 我计划要做的就是学法语。

en: Drivers must stop at the stop line.
zh: 司机必须在停止线停车。

en: At the ethics committee, a temporary halt to cloning experiments was decided.
zh: 伦理委员会决定暂时停止克隆实验。
苏联问题专家是研究什么的？

en: By the way, have you heard about Suzuki?
zh: 对了，你听说铃木的事了吗？

en: We shouted for help at the tops of our voices.
zh: 我们扯着嗓子大喊救命。

en: The police were watching Yamada's movements.
zh: 警察在监视山田的一举一动。

en: The colour drained from her face at the news of the traffic accident.
zh: 听到交通事故的消息，她的脸色刷地一下白了。

en: Our store has a monopoly on this item.
zh: 这件商品只有我们店有卖。

en: I had to fill the gap left when our head clerk quit on short notice.
zh: 主管突然辞职了，我得顶他的缺。

en: Among my acquaintances are many Japanese-speaking Americans.
zh: 我认识的人里有很多会说日语的美国人。

en: Tom lost his appetite due to the heat wave.
zh: 汤姆因为天太热没胃口。

en: Tom lost his wife seven years ago.
zh: 汤姆的妻子七年前去世了。

en: Tom lost his only son in a car accident.
zh: 汤姆的独生子在车祸中丧生了。

en: Tom broke his left ankle during a rugby match.
zh: 汤姆在橄榄球赛中摔断了左脚踝。

en: You're always all talk and no action!
Tom no longer lives in Boston.
zh: 汤姆不再住在波士顿了。

en: Tom encountered Mary for the first time three years ago.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽三年前第一次见面。

en: Tom met Mary for the first time three years ago.
zh: 汤姆三年前初次见到玛丽。

en: Tom gave Mary his phone number.
zh: 汤姆把他的电话号码给了玛丽。

en: Tom had his wisdom teeth removed.
Tom has never eaten horse meat carpaccio.
zh: 汤姆从来没吃过生马肉片。
汤姆完全没听玛丽的建议。

en: Tom is 3 years older than Mary.
Tom's trying to make the impossible possible.
zh: 汤姆正试着把不可能变成可能。

en: Tom is trying to make the impossible possible.
zh: 汤姆正试图化不可能为可能。

en: In the amusement park Mary found a boy on his own weeping, and spoke to him gently. "Hey, sonny, what is it? Are you lost? Would you like me to take you to the Lost Children Department?"
zh: 在游乐园里，玛丽看到一个小男孩在独自哭泣，就温柔地问他：“嘿，小朋友，怎么啦？迷路了吗？要不要我带你去广播找人那儿？”

en: Tom was the only guy in the class.
Oh, look! There's a big snake over there!
Ken threw a sushi party at his house.
zh: 阿健在家里办了个寿司派对。

en: I broke my gas-powered rice cooker so I got an induction rice cooker instead.
zh: 我把燃气电饭煲弄坏了，所以换了个电磁的。

en: My body still hurts, but that multi-day holiday trip was super fun!
zh: 我浑身还疼着呢，不过那几天的长假旅行超开心的！

en: My husband caught a cold and he's resting in bed.
zh: 我老公感冒了，正躺在床上休息呢。

en: Tom went to Japan on a work holiday visa.
zh: 汤姆拿着打工度假签证去日本了。

en: This washing machine is compact and good value for money.
zh: 这台洗衣机挺小巧的，性价比很高。

en: Don't you think that Ronald Mcdonald is a bit creepy?
zh: 你不觉得麦当劳叔叔有点吓人吗？

en: Geez, I wish this test would finish soon.
zh: 哎，真希望这考试快点结束。

en: The men's room is on the second floor.
"It's raining horribly hard. You didn't get wet?" "No, I'm okay."
zh: “雨下得太大了。你没淋湿吧？”“没事，我挺好的。”

en: Both Tom and Mary like old movies.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽都喜欢老电影。

en: Mary'd be cute if she'd just shut up. Her way of speaking really gets on my nerves.
zh: 玛丽要是不说话还挺可爱的。她说话的方式真的让我很烦。
我在汤姆家给你打电话呢。

en: The sum of the angles of a triangle on a spherical plane is more than 180 degrees.
zh: 球面三角形的内角和大于180度。

en: I'd like to hear Tom's opinion at least once before we come to a conclusion.
zh: 在得出结论之前，我想至少听听汤姆的意见。

en: Tom and Mary are considering divorce.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽在考虑离婚。

en: Tom and Mary are thinking about divorce.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽在想离婚的事。

en: Have you ever listened to the French version of this opera?
zh: 你听过这个歌剧的法语版吗？

en: I want a piece of pie.
I want a piece of cake.
Tom is more than my friend, but he's not quite my boyfriend.
zh: 汤姆不只是我的朋友，但还没到男朋友那一步。

en: Tom is the kind of person who is deeply conscious of how other people think of him.
zh: 汤姆是那种特别在意别人怎么看他的人。

en: Tom wrote down without fail every one of Mary's words.
zh: 汤姆把玛丽说的每一句话都记下来了，一个字都没落。

en: The piano in Tom's house is out of tune.
zh: 汤姆家的钢琴音不准了。

en: We have already passed the peak of the summer heat, but it's still hot during the day.
zh: 最热的时候已经过去了，但白天还是挺热的。

en: The fireworks show was suspended after 30 minutes due to the thunderstorm.
zh: 因为雷阵雨，烟花秀放了三十分钟就停了。

en: Please return to your seats and fasten your seatbelts.
zh: 请回到座位，系好安全带。

en: Tom is the same age as me.
The Imari porcelain plate that my father cherished was quite heavy.
zh: 我父亲心爱的那个伊万里瓷盘挺沉的。

en: The song played by that blind pianist really moved me.
zh: 那个盲人钢琴家弹的曲子真让我感动。

en: You say that your savings are piling up and you have no way of spending them? That's really an extravagant kind of worry to have.
zh: 你说你存款多得花不掉？这烦恼也太奢侈了吧。

en: Tom, where are you? Everyone's looking for you!
zh: 汤姆，你在哪儿呢？大家都在找你！

en: "Are you happy to be alive?" "Yes, I'm happy."
zh: “活着你觉得幸福吗？”“嗯，挺幸福的。”

en: You can see the Skytree from there.
Tom doesn't have any brothers or sisters.
I know what we can do.
zh: 我知道我们可以做什么。

en: I need to send a fax.
I need to make a copy.
I'll wait here until he returns.
I just want to hug you.
I got up a minute ago.

zh: 我有一辆红色的自行车。

en: Do you want to see me?
I need to go to Chicago.
Tom took off his wedding ring and threw it into the pond.
zh: 汤姆摘下婚戒，扔进了池塘里。

en: Why are you wearing a raincoat? It's not raining, is it?
zh: 你为什么穿雨衣？没下雨吧？

en: Tom used the key Mary had given him to open the door.
zh: 汤姆用玛丽给他的钥匙开了门。

en: I want to thank you for picking Tom up after school.
zh: 我想谢谢你放学后去接汤姆。

en: Nobody is in the living room, but the TV is on.
zh: 客厅里没人，但电视开着。

en: It's been a long time since I've felt this bad.
zh: 我很久没这么难受过了。

en: I think you were better looking with long hair.
zh: 我觉得你留长发更好看。

en: Tom opened the safe and took out his passport.
zh: 汤姆打开保险箱，拿出了护照。

en: Tom picked up the phone and started talking.
zh: 汤姆拿起电话，开始说了起来。

en: Tom took Mary's arm and they started walking.
zh: 汤姆挽住玛丽的胳膊，两人开始往前走。

en: Tom seems to be having a little difficulty.
zh: 汤姆好像遇到了点困难。

en: Tom and Mary left through different doors.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽是从不同的门出去的。

en: Tom said that somebody here needed help.
zh: 汤姆说这儿有人需要帮忙。

en: Tom left here about thirty minutes ago.
zh: 汤姆大约三十分钟前离开的。

en: Tom left a message saying he'd be late.
zh: 汤姆留了言，说他会晚点到。

en: Tom and Mary were dancing to the music.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽正跟着音乐跳舞。

en: There has to be another way to do this.
Tom and Mary were both born in Boston.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽都出生在波士顿。

en: Neither Tom nor Mary can speak French.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽都不会说法语。

en: Tom put some flowers on Mary's grave.
zh: 汤姆在玛丽的坟前放了一些花。

en: Tom is one of the singers in my band.
zh: 汤姆是我们乐队里的歌手之一。

en: Tom is in the kitchen washing dishes.
Tom and Mary got married last spring.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽去年春天结婚了。

en: Tom is the one with the car, not me.
Tom took control of the situation.
Tom set his alarm clock for 2:30.
zh: 汤姆把闹钟定到了两点半。

en: Tom knew Mary didn't know French.
zh: 汤姆知道玛丽不会说法语。

en: Tom and Mary are waiting outside.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽在外面等着呢。

en: Do you know where Tom was hiding?
zh: 你知道汤姆躲在哪儿吗？

en: Have you ever seen Tom's mother?
Tom walked away from the group.
Tom told me he was really busy.
zh: 汤姆跟我说他真的很忙。

en: You said that Tom wasn't busy.
You need a good night's sleep.
What're you doing in my house?
What were you doing in Boston?
zh: 你在波士顿干什么来着？

en: Tom says he doesn't know Mary.
Did Tom say when he'd arrive?
zh: 汤姆有没有说他什么时候到？

en: Are you saying Tom is a liar?
Have you ever seen a ghost?

zh: 波士顿是个很棒的城市。

en: You must be very busy now.
What did you do in Boston?
zh: 你在波士顿都干了些什么？
汤姆又重复了一遍他的问题。

en: Tom kept his eyes on Mary.
Does Tom have to be there?

zh: 我们需要一个新的保姆。

en: Tom looked up at the sky.

zh: 汤姆其实看起来挺开心的。
汤姆看起来真的很心虚。
汤姆和玛丽看起来挺开心的。
汤姆挺喜欢在这儿工作的。
汤姆从自行车上下来了。
汤姆从来没问过为什么。

en: Will you shut your trap for a minute?
"Um, what day was it today again?" "August 5th."
Last night, the temperature went down to ten degrees below zero.
zh: 昨晚气温降到了零下十度。

en: The temperature went down to minus ten degrees centigrade last night.
zh: 昨晚气温降到了摄氏零下十度。

en: My grandfather rarely talked about the war.
zh: 我爷爷很少谈起那场战争。

en: During an interview after the game, the coach voiced his discontent towards the umpire.
zh: 赛后采访时，教练表达了对裁判的不满。

en: What's the difference between fermentation and putrescence?
zh: 发酵和腐烂有什么区别？

en: Chinese is always harder than any other language.
zh: 中文总是比其他语言更难。

en: The clear and refreshing sound of the wind chimes is one of the characteristics of summers in Japan, but in recent years the number of people who perceive it merely as noise has been increasing.
zh: 风铃清脆的声音是日本夏天的特色之一，但近年来，觉得那是噪音的人越来越多了。

en: I love dogs so I often go to the park with my dog.
zh: 我很爱狗，所以我经常带我家的狗去公园。

en: Tom has already gone to sleep.
When the jet flew over the building the windowpanes rattled.
zh: 喷气式飞机飞过大楼时，窗户玻璃震得直响。

en: Going to bed early and waking up early is very good both for your health and appearance.
zh: 早睡早起对身体和气色都很好。

en: Tom has had no interest in other people since he was a child.
zh: 汤姆从小就对别人不感兴趣。

en: The washing machine is making a strange sound.
zh: 洗衣机发出的声音怪怪的。

en: I hope my part-time job ends early today.
zh: 希望今天打工能早点结束。

en: Perhaps I'll make some candy today.
zh: 今天我也许会做点糖果。

en: Shall we make candy or something today?
zh: 我们今天做点糖果什么的吧？

en: I want to become a kinder person.
zh: 我想成为一个更温柔的人。

en: I forgot to eat lunch, so let's eat dinner early.
zh: 我忘了吃午饭了，咱们早点吃晚饭吧。

en: I don't want to meet anyone for a while and I don't want to go outside either.
zh: 这阵子我谁都不想见，也不想出门。

en: Tom and Mary are playing in the park making soap bubbles.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽在公园里吹泡泡玩。

en: I just got to the station. I'll be waiting for you at the library.
zh: 我刚到车站，我在图书馆等你。

en: There's also a toilet on the fourth floor.
There is also a toilet on the fourth floor.
There is a toilet on the fourth floor, too.
Oh, I just remembered. The library's closed tomorrow.
zh: 噢，我刚想起来，明天图书馆不开门。

en: Please be careful not to forget your card or your change in the machine.
zh: 请注意别把卡或找零忘在机器里。

en: Is there anything else I can help you with?
zh: 还有什么我能帮你的吗？

en: Tom wants to go by train.
I have no idea what's causing these problems.
zh: 我完全不知道这些问题是怎么回事。

en: We must deal with this problem right away.
zh: 我们得马上处理这个问题。

en: Call me if you have a problem.
With that big salary you're getting I guess you've saved up quite a lot.
zh: 拿那么多工资，我想你肯定攒了不少钱吧。

en: Walking on a train platform while distracted is very dangerous.
zh: 在站台上走神是很危险的。

en: "Sorry," said Tom with a tear in his eye.
zh: “对不起，”汤姆眼含泪水地说道。

en: We should have gone on a day that wasn't so hot.
zh: 我们早该挑个没这么热的日子去的。

en: We should have gone on a cooler day.
zh: 我们早该挑个凉快点的日子去的。

en: At this restaurant, you eat spaghetti with chopsticks.
zh: 在这家店，意大利面是拿筷子吃的。

en: I'm 24 years old and I haven't had a boyfriend in 6 years.
zh: 我24岁了，已经6年没交过男朋友了。

en: I want to do something that I can't do if I'm not pressed for time.
zh: 我想做点如果不赶时间就没法做的事。

en: He has no ability to reason logically at all.
zh: 他根本没有逻辑思考的能力。

en: If I'm reincarnated, I want to come back as a cat.
zh: 如果有下辈子，我想当一只猫。

en: There's a large gingko tree that's said to be 800 years old inside the grounds of a nearby shrine.
zh: 附近的神社里有一棵据说有800年树龄的大银杏树。

en: The soft afternoon sun came in through the branches of the tree and then the window.
zh: 下午柔和的阳光穿过树枝，洒进了窗户。
妈，汤姆把我的饼干吃了。

en: Tom always makes a funny face when I point the camera at him.
zh: 只要我拿相机对着汤姆，他就会做鬼脸。

en: Tom has become incapable of loving himself.
zh: 汤姆已经变得没法爱自己了。

en: Wait, what are you doing here?
Tom displayed the contents of his wallet.
zh: 汤姆把钱包里的东西都亮了出来。

en: If you feel like crying, you should cry to your heart's content.
zh: 想哭的话就痛痛快快地哭出来吧。

en: I will go to the school tomorrow.
I can't stop shaking my leg.
I feel like I'm always being watched.
zh: 我总觉得有人在盯着我。

en: Don't make such a mean face.
"I'm afraid of having eye surgery." "It's no time to be saying that kind of thing. At this rate, you might lose your vision completely."
zh: “我怕动眼睛手术。”“现在哪是说这种话的时候？照这样下去，你可能会彻底失明。”

en: "I'm afraid of having eye surgery." "It's no time to be saying that kind of thing. At this rate, you might lose your eyesight."
zh: “我怕动眼睛手术。”“现在哪是说这种话的时候？照这样下去，你视力就全毁了。”

en: I'd rather live happily in the present than go down in history.
zh: 我宁愿当下活得开心，也不想名留青史。

en: Tom started talking to his girlfriend about breaking up.
zh: 汤姆开始和他女朋友谈分手的事了。

en: At that time, I thought that I was going to die for real.
zh: 那时候我真以为我要没命了。
汤姆是在65岁那年退休的。

en: I have become disgusted of living.
Whenever I lie down on my bed and read a book, I fall asleep.
zh: 我只要一躺在床上看书就会睡着。

en: Tom wanted to be able to read the original Quran and solely for that reason he started learning Arabic.
zh: 汤姆想看古兰经的原著，就为了这，他才开始学阿拉伯语。

en: I wonder if there's some way of attracting more Japanese speakers to Tatoeba?
zh: 我在想，有没有什么办法能吸引更多说日语的人来Tatoeba？

en: Tom believes in traditional gender roles.
zh: 汤姆相信传统的性别分工。

en: Tom believes that men should rule over women.
zh: 汤姆认为男人应该统治女人。

en: Tom believes in a patriarchal society.
Find this function's global maximum and global minimum.
zh: 找出这个函数的最大值和最小值。

en: Tom is a language genius who speaks 10 languages fluently, but he's really bad at maths and can't even solve a simple first-order equation.
zh: 汤姆是个语言天才，能流利地说十种语言，但他数学特别差，连个简单的一元一次方程都不会解。

en: Isn't there an old bakery somewhere in this town?
zh: 这个镇上是不是有个老面包店？

en: Tom confessed his love to me yesterday and we have started dating.
zh: 汤姆昨天跟我表白了，我们已经开始交往了。

en: Mary is a mother of two.
zh: 玛丽是两个孩子的妈妈。

en: It's better if you take what Tom says with a grain of salt.
zh: 汤姆说的话，你最好别全信。

en: I think that we should take what Tom said earlier with a grain of salt.
zh: 我觉得汤姆刚才说的话，咱们得打个折扣听。

en: Tatoeba is a project centered on Earthlings—it still only has one alien language on it.
zh: Tatoeba是一个以地球人为中心的项目——目前上面还只有一种外星语言。

en: Tom the Saturnian decided to set out for Venus over summer break to meet Mary the Venusian, who he met on Twitter.
zh: 土星人汤姆决定暑假去金星看望玛丽，玛丽是他在推特上认识的金星人。

en: Tom's voice is so sexy! It really makes my chest tight!
zh: 汤姆的声音太性感了！听得我心跳加速！

en: I've had a runny nose for two days and I've been feeling an uncomfortable sensation in my throat.
zh: 我流了两天鼻涕了，嗓子总觉得不大舒服。

en: Tom, you're really cute so, I think you would blend in perfectly at an all-girls school.
zh: 汤姆，你长得太可爱了，我觉得你混进女校里一点违和感都没有。

en: Life is made of encounters and partings.
zh: 人生就是不断的相遇和别离。

en: Mary's daughter died in an accident.
zh: 玛丽的女儿死于一场事故。

en: Mary likes doing different things from other people.
zh: 玛丽喜欢做些和别人不一样的事情。

en: There's nothing more painful than losing one's loved child.
zh: 没有什么比失去心爱的孩子更痛苦的了。

en: Tom was finally able to buy himself a home, as he had long desired.
zh: 汤姆终于如愿以偿，买到了他梦寐以求的房子。

en: Don't complain about it. You've asked for it.
zh: 别抱怨了，那是你自找的。

en: The teacher made the students do a lot of homework.
zh: 老师让学生们做了好多作业。

en: That manager often makes "people" work long hours.
zh: 那个经理经常让员工加班。
我可以用一下洗手间吗？

en: Don't make me say the same thing over and over again!
zh: 别让我一遍又一遍地重复同样的话！

en: I'm told by everybody that I am strange.
zh: 大家都说我这人挺怪的。

en: Do you have problems in losing weight?
zh: 你减肥遇到什么困难了吗？

en: The Brothers Grimm collected fairy tales all-over Germany.
zh: 格林兄弟在德国各地搜集童话故事。

en: Tom, you have really taught me many things.
zh: 汤姆，你真的教了我很多东西。

en: Tom has really taught me many things.
zh: 汤姆真的教了我很多东西。

en: I have truly learned many things from Tom.
zh: 我真的从汤姆那里学到了很多。

en: Your mental age is too low.
The printer had a paper jam.
Tom eats a lot despite appearances.
zh: 汤姆看着不显，其实挺能吃的。

en: Every detail of his writing is carefully composed.
zh: 他作品中的每一个细节都是精心构思的。

en: For a business owner, having a clear overview of one's entire business is vital.
zh: 对老板来说，能掌控生意全局至关重要。

en: Tom bought a new multifunction printer.
zh: 汤姆买了一台新的多功能打印机。

en: Tom and his friends use the school printer every month to print the student bulletin.
zh: 汤姆和他的朋友们每个月都用学校的打印机印学生简报。

en: When Tom translates one of my sentences, I feel glad to be alive.
zh: 汤姆翻译我的句子时，我感觉活着真好。

en: Recently, Tom hasn't been translating my sentences. Does he hate me?
zh: 最近汤姆一直没翻译我的句子，他是不是讨厌我？

en: There are 16 characters named Tom in this novel.
zh: 这部小说里有16个叫汤姆的人物。

en: As long as it's not too much of a bother, people like to be nice to other people.
zh: 只要不太麻烦，大家都愿意对别人友善一点。

en: I'm not in the mood to watch TV this evening.
I made too many cookies, so won't you take some?
zh: 我饼干做多了，你要不要带点儿？

en: If I could, I would love to experience once again a bittersweet love like in middle school.
zh: 如果可以的话，我想再体验一次中学时代那种酸酸甜甜的恋爱。

en: After her first date with Tom, Mary was distracted all day, couldn't concentrate on her classes and didn't feel hungry.
zh: 跟汤姆第一次约会后，玛丽整天都魂不守舍的，上课没法专心，也不觉得饿。

en: Can you stop talking loudly on the phone at night?
zh: 你晚上打电话能不能别这么大声？

en: It is said that Lycopene, a pigment found in tomatoes, makes your skin beautiful and helps you lose weight.
zh: 据说番茄里的番茄红素能美容还能减肥。

en: I understand that life without love is impossible for me.
zh: 我明白了，我的生活里不能没有爱。

en: What are your favorite ingredients to put into Miso soup?
zh: 你喝味噌汤最喜欢加什么料？

en: I didn't think that university would be so much fun.
zh: 我没想到大学生活会这么好玩。

en: It's best to discuss relationship issues directly with your partner.
zh: 感情问题最好直接跟伴侣沟通。

en: I am rapidly losing the ability of immersing myself in activities that I love.
zh: 我正在迅速失去沉浸在爱好中的能力。

en: Tom's translation is too focused on the rhythm of English translation, and ignores the nuances of the original.
zh: 汤姆的翻译太看重英语的节奏感，忽略了原著的细微差别。

en: My normal body temperature is around 37 degrees.
zh: 我的正常体温在37度左右。

en: I've had the flu since Monday. Right now, my temperature has gone down, but I don't feel completely normal yet.
zh: 我从周一开始得了流感。现在烧退了，但感觉还没完全好透。

en: My only worry is that I have no worries.
zh: 我唯一的烦恼就是没有烦恼。

en: Tom's personality changes completely when he grabs the mic.
zh: 汤姆一拿起麦克风就像变了个人。

en: I need to go to the hospital.

zh: 汤姆目前在波士顿工作。

en: Tom was worried that Mary's words were indirectly aimed at him, but in truth she was only talking about herself in a self-depreciating manner.
zh: 汤姆担心玛丽在含沙射影地说他，但其实她只是在自嘲。

en: As long as the whole world has not reached happiness, individual happiness is impossible.
zh: 只要全世界还没都获得幸福，个人的幸福就不可能实现。

en: Happy people are those who remember only the good things from the past, while unhappy people are those who remember only the opposite.
zh: 幸福的人只记得过去美好的事，而不幸的人正好相反。

en: Please look at the pamphlet for the details.
Why didn't you bring your hat today?
Tom, there's a bee on your head!
I really had an enjoyable childhood.
zh: 我的童年真的过得挺开心的。

en: I had such fun times when I was a kid.
zh: 我小时候真的玩得特别开心。

en: Mary looks cute no matter what she wears.
zh: 玛丽不管穿什么都挺可爱的。

en: I'm just an amateur when it comes to art, but I really like this painting.
zh: 我对艺术不太懂，只是个外行，但我真的很喜欢这幅画。

en: You should not judge people based on their name.
zh: 你不该凭名字去判断一个人。

en: Please store it at -18C or lower.
zh: 请在零下18度或更低温度下储存。

en: Goethe's poem "Mignon" is widely read in Japan in Mori Ogai's excellent translation.
zh: 歌德的诗《迷娘》在日本流传很广，这要归功于森鸥外的优秀译本。

en: I think that Liszt's "Forgotten Waltz No.3" is a hidden masterpiece.
zh: 我觉得李斯特的《被遗忘的圆舞曲第三号》是一部被埋没的杰作。

en: On one hand, water shortages are expected this summer because of lower rainfall, but on the other hand, large rainstorms are 3.5 times more likely locally than last year.
zh: 一方面，由于降雨量减少，今年夏天预计会缺水；但另一方面，当地发生大暴雨的可能性是去年的3.5倍。

en: If you feel a tremor near the coast, evacuate immediately to high ground or another safe location.
zh: 如果你在海岸附近感觉到震动，请立即撤离到高地或其他安全地点。

en: You shouldn't judge a person based on his or her name.
zh: 你不该通过名字来评价一个人。

en: You shouldn't judge people based on their names.
zh: 你不该凭名字来评价别人。
有时候，这个世界看起来挺没意义的。

en: He dug a hole using a shovel.
My parents are travelling overseas for a week.
I want to eat a good yakisoba bread.
zh: 我想吃好吃的炒面面包。

en: I want to eat a tasty yakisoba bread.
zh: 我想吃个好吃的炒面面包。

en: The sun went down behind the mountains.
Can I have your cellphone number?
zh: 能给我下你的手机号吗？

en: It occurred to me that there's a book that I need to return today.
zh: 我突然想起来我今天还有本书得还。

en: Go away. I want to be alone.
Go somewhere else. I want to be alone.
zh: 去别的地方，我想单独呆会儿。

en: What's the name of this river?
Both you and I are men.
She wanted to be a singer.
I know those girls over there quite well.
zh: 我跟那边那些女生挺熟的。

en: Where's the proof that he committed a crime?

One of the reasons Twitter is popular in Japan is a characteristic of Japanese itself: Japanese uses ideograms which enable it to convey more information in just 140 characters than other languages, not counting Chinese. Incidentally, the Japanese version of this sentence is written with exactly 140 characters. How many characters does it take in other languages?
zh: 推特在日本流行的原因之一是日语本身的特点：日语使用表意文字，这使得它在短短140个字内就能比除了中文以外的其他语言传达更多信息。顺便说一下，这句话的日语版刚好是140个字。用其他语言需要多少个字呢？

en: The track club was the only place where I could be myself.
zh: 田径社是我唯一能做回自己的地方。

en: "What's the capital of Sri Lanka?" "Sri Jayawardenapura Kotte." "Correct!"
zh: “斯里兰卡的首都是哪儿？”“斯里贾亚瓦德纳普拉科特。”“答对了！”
tokens: 斯里贾亚瓦德纳普拉科特

en: Mary can't bring herself to eat chocolates in the shape of cute animals, so she asked Tom not to give her any anymore.
zh: 玛丽不忍心吃可爱动物形状的巧克力，所以她让汤姆以后别再送她这种了。

en: Tom is known as Mary on the Internet.
Tom and Mary are hugging each other naked.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽正光着身子搂抱在一起。

en: Everyone knows there is no such thing as a perfect person.
zh: 大家都知道，这世上没有完美的人。

en: This month really flew by without me doing anything at all.
zh: 这个月我啥也没干就过去了，时间过得真快。

en: Tom, with his good manners and winning smile, is popular with both men and women.
zh: 汤姆举止大方，笑容很有感染力，男女老少都挺喜欢他的。

en: Acerolas have 17 times as much vitamin C as lemons.
zh: 针叶樱桃的维C含量是柠檬的17倍。

en: Brazil is the fifth biggest country in the world.
Tom dreams of the toilet when he has to go to the bathroom.
zh: 汤姆想上厕所的时候就会梦见厕所。

en: Tom retired at the age of 65.
This family has been turning out lawyers generation after generation.
zh: 这家人祖祖辈辈都是当律师的。

en: Thanks for coming from so far away!
The view from the mountain top far surpassed our expectations.
zh: 山顶的景色远超我们的预想。

en: Go ahead and eat. It will get cold.
zh: 快吃吧，不然一会儿该凉了。

en: All men die. Tom is a man. Therefore, Tom will die.
zh: 所有人都会死。汤姆是人。所以，汤姆也会死。

en: All men are mortal. Tom is a man. Therefore, Tom is mortal.
zh: 人都是会死的。汤姆是人。所以，汤姆也会死。

en: I don't have any time for you right now.
A draw is held for those who have participated in our survey. Every month, thirty people will be chosen at random and presented with a gift voucher to the value of 10,000 Yen.
zh: 我们会针对参与调查的人进行抽奖，每月随机抽取30名，每人赠送价值一万日元的代金券。

en: Each month, a gift certificate worth 10,000 yen will be given to thirty people chosen at random who have completed this questionnaire.
zh: 每个月，我们会从填写了问卷的人中随机抽取30位，并赠送价值一万日元的礼券。

en: There have been many attacks by molesters lately. Please try to walk on bright and well-frequented roads as much as possible.
zh: 最近色狼出没频繁，请尽量走光线充足、人流较多的路。

en: I think that Tom looks better with his natural black hair than with bleached hair.
zh: 我觉得汤姆留自然黑发比漂过的头发好看。

en: Tom was completely soaked by the rain.
zh: 汤姆被雨淋成了落汤鸡。

en: I'm sure I lost at least 3 kilos this week.
zh: 我敢肯定我这周起码瘦了三公斤。

en: I'm sure I lost at least 6 and a half pounds this week.
zh: 我敢肯定我这周起码瘦了六磅半。

en: Tom is a lot taller than Mary is.
Tom is much taller than Mary is.
The cuneiform alphabet invented by the Sumerians was used by many languages in the ancient Near East.
zh: 苏美尔人发明的楔形文字曾被古代近东地区的多种语言所使用。

en: Ancient Egypt used a solar calendar with 365 days in a year.
zh: 古埃及使用的是一年365天的阳历。

en: In 508BC, the ruler of Athens, Cleisthenes established ostracism to prevent the appearance of a tyrant.
zh: 公元前508年，雅典执政官克里斯提尼为了防止暴君出现，设立了陶片放逐制。

en: The emperor Theodosius made Christianity the state religion and banned other religions.
zh: 狄奥多西大帝将基督教定为国教，并禁止了其他宗教。

en: Louis the 14th, known as the "Sun King", brought about the golden age of the French absolute monarchy.
zh: 被称为“太阳王”的路易十四开创了法国君主专制的黄金时代。

en: Let's be more prepared when we act next time.
zh: 下次行动前我们准备得再充分点吧。

en: Tom committed suicide because he was bullied at school.
zh: 汤姆因为在学校受欺负自杀了。

en: I'm sorry I made you cry yesterday.
zh: 对不起，昨天把你惹哭了。

en: I'm sorry that I made you cry yesterday.
zh: 我很抱歉昨天让你哭了。

en: Cook about one and a half cup of rice.

zh: 汤姆干活儿马马虎虎的。
汤姆失去了同事们的信任。

en: They lost their trust in Tom.

zh: 汤姆失去了他们的信任。

en: Tom has read Shakespeare's complete works.
zh: 汤姆读过莎士比亚全集。

en: Tom is interested by many things.
zh: 汤姆对很多事情都感兴趣。

en: Tom has a wide range of interests.
zh: 汤姆的兴趣爱好很广泛。

en: You absolutely need a passport to travel to a foreign country.
zh: 出国旅游一定要有护照。

en: The structural formula for water is H-O-H.
The road has frozen and it's now slippery.
We are interrupting this broadcast to bring you a special news report.
zh: 我们中断一下节目，为您播报一条特别新闻。

en: What's the point of studying foreign languages besides English?
zh: 除了英语，学其他外语还有什么意义？

en: What will you gain by studying a foreign language other than English?
zh: 除了英语，学别的外语能有什么收获？

en: "What languages do you know, Tom?" "C++, Java and a little PHP. What about you, Mary?" "French, Japanese and Hebrew."
zh: “汤姆，你都会哪些语言？”“C++、Java 还有一点 PHP。你呢，玛丽？”“法语、日语和希伯来语。”

en: World War I lasted from 1914 until 1918.
zh: 第一次世界大战从1914年持续到了1918年。

en: This product contains no preservatives. After opening, refrigerate and consume quickly.
zh: 本产品不含防腐剂。开封后请冷藏并尽快食用。

en: Lightning struck nearby without warning! I thought my heart was going to stop beating.
zh: 刚才突然劈下一道闪电！吓得我心跳都快停了。

en: Does anyone know Tom's family name?
zh: 有人知道汤姆姓什么吗？

en: Does anyone know Tom's last name?
Please store in a cool and dry place, out of direct sunlight.
zh: 请存放于阴凉干燥处，避免阳光直射。

en: I hate rain, but I love its smell.
zh: 我讨厌下雨，但我喜欢雨的味道。

en: Tom was at loss for words.
Tom is the kind of guy you just can't hate.
zh: 汤姆是那种让你没法讨厌的人。

en: I'm surprised by the extensiveness of Tom's knowledge.
zh: 汤姆的知识面广得让我惊讶。

en: Tom visited Mary, who was in the hospital with a broken bone.
zh: 汤姆去医院看了骨折住院的玛丽。

en: Tom is in bed with a cold.
zh: 汤姆感冒了，正躺在床上。

en: Tom exchanged greetings by giving his business card.
zh: 汤姆递上名片打了招呼。

en: I don't watch TV very much.

zh: 我以前几乎没看过电视。
我正为法语语法发愁呢。

en: Tom quietly sneaked out of the room.
zh: 汤姆悄悄地溜出了房间。

en: Tom was not able to sit for the exam because he was sick.
zh: 汤姆因为生病没能参加考试。

en: If you mail it by seven PM, it will arrive tomorrow.
zh: 如果你在晚上七点前寄出去，明天就能到。

en: If you mail it by 7:00 p.m., it'll arrive tomorrow.
zh: 只要你在晚上七点前寄出，明天就能送到。

en: The answers for the practice problems are at the end of the book.
zh: 练习题的答案在书最后。

en: The Buddha became enlightened under a Bo tree in Bodh Gaya.
zh: 佛陀在菩提伽耶的菩提树下悟道了。

en: I went to Boston for 5 days on a business trip.
zh: 我去波士顿出差了五天。

en: In Latin, there are six cases: nominative, genitive, dative, accusative, ablative, and vocative.
zh: 拉丁语有六个格：主格、属格、与格、宾格、夺格和呼格。

en: Tom is not cut out to be a teacher.
zh: 汤姆不是当老师的那块料。

en: Tom walks his dog every morning.
zh: 汤姆每天早上都去遛狗。

en: Tom fell into a deep sleep.
Tom is a popular guy in the class.
Tom comes to Boston once a year.
zh: 汤姆每年去一次波士顿。

en: Tom and his wife live separately.
Tom is a very clever boy.
zh: 汤姆是个很聪明的男孩。

en: Tom dried himself with a bath towel.
zh: 汤姆用浴巾擦干了身体。

en: Tom is not interested in politics.
Tom came back covered in mud.
zh: 汤姆满身是泥地回来了。

en: Tom came back home covered in mud.
zh: 汤姆满身是泥地回到了家。

en: Kyoto and Boston are sister cities.
zh: 京都和波士顿是友好城市。

en: The 5 yen coin is made from brass and the 10 yen coin is made from bronze.
zh: 5日元的硬币是黄铜做的，10日元的硬币是青铜做的。

en: Let's choose the best of the tomato crop and take them to the market.
zh: 我们挑一些最好的西红柿拿到市场上去卖吧。

en: This book is translated into 36 languages and has been published in more than a 100 countries all over the world.
zh: 这本书被翻译成了36种语言，并在全球100多个国家出版。

en: Don't cry. Crying doesn't solve anything.
zh: 别哭了，哭又解决不了问题。

en: Tom has devoted his life to the anti-nuclear-energy movement.
zh: 汤姆把自己的一生都献给了反核运动。

en: Tom bumped his head on the roof of the car.
Tom hit his head on the roof of the car.
zh: 汤姆的头撞在了车顶上。

en: Tom jumped into the swimming pool.
Tom has friends all over the world.
The train that Tom was riding was hit by lightning.
zh: 汤姆坐的那列火车被雷劈中了。

en: Just let me get my thoughts in order.
I have had it with Tom.
